LanguageData.SM_Sink.label: kitchen sink
LanguageData.SM_Sink.description: A kitchen sink. Increases cooking speed and butchering speed. Lowers foodpoison chance by increasing the room cleanliness and connected worktable
LanguageData.SM_Sink_Blueprint.label: kitchen sink (blueprint)
LanguageData.SM_Sink_Blueprint_Install.label: kitchen sink (blueprint)
LanguageData.SM_Sink_Frame.label: kitchen sink (building)
LanguageData.SM_Sink_Frame.description: A kitchen sink. Increases cooking speed and butchering speed. Lowers foodpoison chance by increasing the room cleanliness and connected worktable
LanguageData.SM_ButcherShelf.label: butcher shelf
LanguageData.SM_ButcherShelf.description:
A shelf with cleaning produts to keep the butcher table from getting to filthy.
Has to be placed above the butcher table. Increases work speed and lowers foodpoison chance by increasing the room cleanliness.
LanguageData.SM_ButcherShelf_Blueprint.label: butcher shelf (blueprint)

LanguageData.SM_ButcherShelf_Frame.label: butcher shelf (building)
LanguageData.SM_ButcherShelf_Frame.description:
A shelf with cleaning produts to keep the butcher table from getting to filthy.
Has to be placed above the butcher table. Increases work speed and lowers foodpoison chance by increasing the room cleanliness.
